info.title: KYC API
info.description: API Reference for the BaseOne Know-Your-Customers Service API - v1 - 13 02 24

get.description:
This endpoint verifies the supplied identity of your customer and returns a short response to confirm the status of the verification. For the KYC service you want to validate, use the right JSON object in the body params. Then, set the other services to null or remove them. For example if you want to validate only BVN, send only the BVN object and remove the rest of the object.
Use the alpha-3 ISO standard for country code in the countryCode parameter.

parameters.name: bvn
parameters.description: Bank Verification Number (BVN) is a unique 11-digit number used for verification of customers on financial platforms in Nigeria. The customer needs to walk-in and apply for the BVN at their commercial bank.

get.description:
This endpoint verifies the supplied identity of your customer and returns a detailed response of the verification request. The response includes the customer's full details. For the KYC service you want to validate, use the right JSON object in the body params. Then, set the other services to null or remove them. For example if you want to validate only BVN, send only the BVN object and remove the rest of the object.
Use the alpha-3 ISO standard for country code in the countryCode parameter.

parameters.name: bvn
parameters.description: Bank Verification Number (BVN) is a unique 11-digit number used for verification of customers on financial platforms in Nigeria. The customer needs to walk-in and apply for the BVN at their commercial bank.

get.description: This BVN inquiry service is based on the new BVN Consent implementation. When you supply the correct 11-digit Nigerian BVN number, BaseOne returns a sessionID. The sessionID tracks your BVN verification journey

parameters.name: bvn
parameters.description: 11-digit bank verification number for account holders in Nigeria.

post.description: Mode of receipt of OTP for Consent to share BVN information. here, you are to select where the BVN holder will recieve the OTP, be it via SMS text or email message. You can recieve the OTP from your customer who has the BVN through an interface in your website or app.
Verification of OTP for BVN Consent. Here, you supply the OTP code sent to the BVN owner and you have receeived it via your web/app interface. You also need to supply the sessionID to this endpoint.

get.description: Get BVN details based on sessionID. This endpoint allows you to fetch the BVN details of your customer after verifying the OTP received from the same customer. You can choose to get basic or full details of the BVN owner.

parameters.name: sessionId
parameters.description: This is the unique ID generated by BaseOne when you make a successful request with the bvn-inquiry endpoint. It is valid for 5 minutes after it has been created.

parameters.name: IsBasic
parameters.description: True or False. Either get basic or full information of the BVN respectively. Defaults to True

get.description:
This endpoint gives the basic details to help you to verify a customer with a registered Nigerian company RC Number, rcNumber.
- RC number is the business/company registration number.
- CAC is the Corporate Affairs Commission for company registration in Nigeria.

parameters.name: countryCode
parameters.description: ISO-2 or ISO-3 code of the country. For instance, NG or NGA for Nigeria

parameters.name: service
parameters.description: The KYC method used. Pass in CAC here

get.description:
This endpoint gives the full details to help you to verify a customer with a registered Nigerian company RC Number, rcNumber.
- RC number is the business/company registration number.
- CAC is the Corporate Affairs Commission for company registration in Nigeria.

parameters.name: countryCode
parameters.description: ISO-2 or ISO-3 code of the country. For instance, NG or NGA for Nigeria

parameters.name: service
parameters.description: The KYC method used. Pass in CAC here

get.description: This endpoint helps you to verify a customer with the Nigerian international passport and obtain brief details about their identity.

parameters.name: countryCode
parameters.description: ISO-2 or ISO-3 code of the country. For instance, NG or NGA for Nigeria

parameters.name: service
parameters.description: The KYC method used. Pass in PASSPORT here

get.description: Use this endpoint to verify and get the full KYC details of an Nigerian international passport holder.

parameters.name: countryCode
parameters.description: ISO-2 or ISO-3 code of the country. For instance, NG or NGA for Nigeria

parameters.name: service
parameters.description: The KYC method used. Pass in PASSPORT here

get.description: This endpoint helps you to verify a customer with the Nigerian National Identity Number and obtain brief details about their identity.

parameters.name: countryCode
parameters.description: ISO-2 or ISO-3 code of the country. For instance, NG or NGA for Nigeria

parameters.name: service
parameters.description: The KYC method used. Pass in NIN here

get.description: Use this endpoint to verify and get the full KYC details of an Nigerian international passport holder.

parameters.name: countryCode
parameters.description: ISO-2 or ISO-3 code of the country. For instance, NG or NGA for Nigeria

parameters.name: service
parameters.description: The KYC method used. Pass in PASSPORT here

Bearer.description:
JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme.
                      Enter 'Bearer' [space] and then your token in the text input below.
                      Example: 'Bearer 12345abcdef'
Bearer.name: Authorization

Api-Key.description: Api key needed to access the endpoints. Api-Key: My_API_Key
Api-Key.name: Api-Key
